title: Northstar Balloons 34" Number 4 Black
description: Combine our 34" Number 4 Black Foil Balloon with other letters and numbers for a custom message at graduations, birthdays, baby showers, and weddings! Balloon is shipped flat and can be inflated with air or helium. Self-sealing. Reusable. Measures 34". Includes 1 balloon per package.
